pageContext.claim: “When these people come into our country and come in illegally, and then they're dispersed throughout the country, and all of a sudden you see nests of MS-13 -- you know, it's like you're liberating towns. We sent ICE in. … Like in a war, you're liberating a town or an area.”
pageContext.analysis: It's a huge exaggeration to say ICE is "liberating towns," as though they were occupied by an invading foreign power. MS-13 is active in prisons and in a few areas such as Los Angeles, Long Island and the D.C. region. Experts say Trump exaggerates the threat posed by the gang.
